thread.title: Live Cricket Score - Sri Lanka v Bangladesh, 2nd Test, Day 5
thread.title_full: Live Cricket Score - Sri Lanka v Bangladesh, 2nd Test, Day 5

title: Live Cricket Score - Sri Lanka v Bangladesh, 2nd Test, Day 5
text:
BANGLADESH TOUR OF SRI LANKA, 2017   Sri Lanka v Bangladesh, 2nd Test, Day 5  36   Sri Lanka 338, 268/8 (100.0 Ovs) Dilruwan Perera 26 (126) Live Scores Full Scorecard Dimuth Karunaratne used dollops of patience and skill to put together his 5th Test ton and keep Sri Lanka afloat on Day 4. © AFP 
Day 4 threw up varied emotions, with the first being thoroughly dominated by Bangladesh as they caused a landslide in the Sri Lankan batting lineup, to a point where it seemed the hosts might not even gather a 100-run lead. On the other hand, the hosts were constantly pulled through by a gritty Dimuth Karunaratne ton, later to be helped by Dilruwan Perera's steely resilience. 
As it stands now, Sri Lanka have a lead of 139, and adding a few more could give their wily spinner Rangana Herath enough to make the ball talk and the pitch respond. However, the tourists should know that even something just over 150 is chaseable. 
It is a big occasion - the final day of Bangladesh's 100th Test. Can they make it count? And for the big occasion, I, Shirshendu Roy , am here to roll out all the updates for you on what should be a 'cliched' but I've to tell you - Super Sunday! 
Keep your thoughts find their way to @Shirsh9 , and see them make their way up here in our LIVE blog. © Cricbuzz
